# Module 8: Post Classification Analysis and Housekeeping {#sec-module-8}

## Module Overview

This module allows users to review all artifacts generated from previous modules, perform post-classification analysis of the LULC map results from [Module 6](@sec-module-6) (limited to Phase 1 information from a single time-series land cover and land use map, such as bar charts or statistical summary tables), and export the LULC map results with metadata and accuracy assessment (if available). It activates only after completing the LULC map generation and accuracy test in Modules 6 and 7. On the back-end, the system generates an overview report using Quarto templates rendered to HTML, displays summaries and visuals, and handles exports to Google Drive with progress monitoring and notifications. Future options (not in Phase 1) include additional exports like training data visualizations, separability tables/graphs, classification model assets, soft prediction GeoTIFFs, and publishing to Epistem-Y with user notes, terms, and comments.

## Checking Prerequisites from Previous Modules

**Front-end**

The user clicks Module 8 to attempt access.

If prerequisites are missing, Module 8 remains inactive, and the user is notified to complete Modules 6 and 7.

**Back-end**

Activate Module 8 only if the user has finished generating the LULC map and accuracy test; check the existence of results from Modules 6 and 7, along with prerequisites from Module 1.

The system checks whether output from Module 7 is available.

If not, keep Module 8 inactive.

## Post-Classification Analysis and Export

### Access Module and Check Prerequisites {#sec-access-module-and-check-prerequisites}

**Front-end**

User attempts to access Module 8.

If prerequisites missing, notify user and keep module inactive.

**Back-end**

Activate Module 8 only if outputs from Modules 6 and 7 exist, and Module 1 prerequisites met.

### Data Collection and Verification {#sec-data-collection-and-verification}

**Front-end**

Runs automatically upon access.

**Back-end**

1.  Collect and verify data and variables: AOI, year, image type, cloud percentage, land cover classes, training data digest, model specifications from [Module 6](@sec-module-6), minimum-cloud mosaic and metadata from [Module 1](@sec-module-1), classified LULC map and metadata, accuracy test table from [Module 7](@sec-module-7).\
2.  Calculate area summary table and generate bar graph visualization.

### Generate Report {#sec-generate-report}

**Front-end**

Prepares report for display.

**Back-end**

Uses Module 8 Report and LULC Map Templates (.qmd) to render summary report to HTML with visuals and stats.

### Display LULC Classification Overview Report {#sec-display-lulc-classification-overview-report}

**Front-end**

User views summary including:

-   AOI and metadata from Modules 1-6 and 7, such as thumbnails, bar charts, tables, accuracy results.

**Back-end**

Displays generated report with maps and charts.

### Export Data {#sec-export-data}

**Front-end**

1.  Users can download exported assets to Google Drive if quota allows.\
2.  Download buttons show file size and estimated time.\
3.  Progress indicators and completion notifications appear.

**Back-end**

1.  Identify classified map and metadata from [Module 6](@sec-module-6).\
2.  Include accuracy results from [Module 7](@sec-module-7) if available; log warning if not.\
3.  Prepare export filenames and size estimates.\
4.  Trigger Google Drive export action.\
5.  Monitor export job and notify user on completion.

### Publish to Epistem-Y {#sec-publish-to-epistem-y}

**Front-end**

(Not in Phase 1) Menu option for publishing assets with terms acceptance and comment fields.

**Back-end**

(Post-Phase 1) Handle publishing LULC maps with user notes to platform.
